Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
July 2021 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

We are happy to start the second half of 2021. As you all know, much planning has gone behind the scenes as we move into the third quarter. We are proud of our accomplishments as a team and hope everybody continues to deliver value for the company and focus on execution. Any comments or questions? Support our commitment to improving employee communication. Continue to say safe and healthy!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Search Marketing Expo (SMX) Advanced 2021. Several of our colleagues virtually attended the SMX Advanced conference this June, where industry experts cover the most recent information and best practices about search marketing and SEO.

Justia Company Announcements Portal. Our team recently launched our brand new Press Center, which provides journalists, bloggers, and the general public with access to the latest company press releases and news from Justia. Get updated on the life and latest happenings of our company.

Onward Promotion. We made a few changes in order to increase the Onward audience. One was adding a new subscription feature for the blog so users can get instant notifications when a new post is published. The other one is that we are sharing the latest Onward posts in our Caselaw summary newsletters.

Hackathon 2021. On June 17th, we held our 2nd ever Justia Hackathon. Engineers were allowed to pick and work on their own projects all day long. The project didn't even have to be work-related; it just needed to use a new technology unfamiliar to the person or team implementing it. We anxiously await the results because this time around, there is prize money on the line.

Lawyer Directory SEO & Design Changes We've made some SEO changes to the lawyer directory premium listings to help our search engine placement. We've also taken the time to redesign the premium placements on mobile devices slightly. Benchmarking was completed and scheduled to measure and analyze the effect of our changes.

Social Media Tags for Justia Blogs. We've added changes to include Twitter meta tags which provide information about the authors and an estimated reading time in the snippet when a post is shared in social media for Justia blogs like Onward, Avanza, Verdict, Justia Daily Summaries, and many more.

Backend Maintenances. As usual, we perform maintenance operations on several properties in order to ensure their security and availability. We did a mass upgrade of first and third-party packages used in our applications. We are also in the middle of upgrading most of our databases, with 47% of the instances completed already.

QA Automation. Consistency across our application is super important, so our QA team released automated checks for Justia standard footer layouts. The next goal is to do the same for the header layouts.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • New Centers: We’ve created the content for International Law, Constitutional Law, Communications and Internet Law, and Entertainment Law during this past month.
  • COVID-19 Updates: We’ve continued to update the 50-state surveys on mask mandates, travel restrictions, evictions, court operations, and general restrictions.
  • Criminal Law Center: Our team has added hundreds of informational boxes to these pages to improve their readability.
  • Divorce Center: We’ve started expanding and updating these pages to cover a broader range of issues and needs.

UPCOMING HOLIDAYS

Dates to Remember
USA Independence Day
July 4th

The Fourth of July, an annual celebration of nationhood, also known as Independence Day, commemorates the passage of the Declaration of Independence by the Continental Congress on July 4th, 1776. Enjoy this federal holiday. Happy Fourth of July!

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

Project Hail Mary

The novel centers on middle school-teacher-turned-astronaut Ryland Grace, who wakes up on a spaceship with no memory. He soon learns that he is the sole survivor on a desperate mission to save the Earth.

He starts recovering his memories slowly as he puts the pieces together to find out what has happened to complete his interstellar mission to save humanity. It is a fabulous story of sheer determination to survive using science and engineering against overwhelming odds.

The author is known for conducting extensive research for the sake of scientific accuracy, so this is also a great book to learn a thing or two about physics, astrobiology, and orbital mechanics. There's already a movie being made starring Ryan Gosling.

- Miguel Berlanga

Available on Amazon

Collaborators: Miguel Berlanga, Donovan Coronado, Haydee Garcia, Alejandra Medina, Lauren Moskie, Rene Peralta, and Jose Ramos
